titleStmt.title: A plain and easie calculation of the name, mark, and number of the name of the beast ... humbly presented to the studious observers of Scripture-prophecies, God's works, and the times / by Nathaniel Stephens ... ; whereunto is prefixed, a commendatory epistle, written by Mr. Edm. Calamy.
titleStmt.author: Stephens, Nathaniel, 1606?-1678.
Calamy, Edmund, 1600-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ja. Cottrel, for Matth. Keynson ... and Hen. Fletcher ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
